plot: Jules Bennett, the Mixtress, serves to connect the unsung, unsigned musicians of the independent music world with a listening audience. She is changing the way music is privately traded and artists are publicly promoted, one mix at a time.
title: The Mixtress
plot_es: Jules Bennett, the Mixtress, serves to connect the unsung, unsigned musicians of the independent music world with a listening audience. She is changing the way music is privately traded and artists are publicly promoted, one mix at a time.
plot_en: Jules Bennett, the Mixtress, serves to connect the unsung, unsigned musicians of the independent music world with a listening audience. She is changing the way music is privately traded and artists are publicly promoted, one mix at a time.
